document_data.mainbody:
The Coast Road ran along the west coast of the Vast, connecting the cities of Ravens Bluff and Tantras.
From south to north, it started at Ravens Bluff, passed over the Fire River via the great multi-span bridge at Mossbridges, and ended at Tantras. On the way, it linked with the High Trail, Feldars Trail, the Tantras Trail, and the Cross Road.
